eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

eventDecorators.name: FaucetOff
eventDecorators.description: Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

eventDecorators.name: FaucetOn
eventDecorators.description: Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

functionDecorators.name: drip1Token
functionDecorators.description: send 1000 Token with a minimum time lock of 1 hour.

functionDecorators.name: drip2Token
functionDecorators.description: send 2000 Token with a minimum time lock of 2 hours.

functionDecorators.name: drip5Token
functionDecorators.description: send 5000 Token with a minimum time lock of 5 hours.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
